name: Insect’s Life Quest
description:
What is it about?

Help the brave Insects close the oil spill and save their home.
Insect's Life Quest is a Casual Platformer with lots of puzzles.

Movements:
Keyboard.Right  OR Keyboard.D= Right
Keyboard.Left OR Keyboard.A = Left
Keyboard.Up OR Keyboard.W = Jump
Keyboard.Enter OR Keyboard.Space = Change Character

Please leave a feedback

  

Technologies used so far:

  • Java
  • LibGDX
  • Box2D
  • Tiled2D
  • Inkscape
  • Blender
